programme.desc: It's all about gobbles and grunts but it's also about so much more than just a trigger pull.

programme.title: Last of A Breed
programme.desc: Arizona has a lot to offer a modern day Mountain Man. This time Sasquatch is taking his Long Bow after the unique critter the Javelina!

programme.title: Savage Outdoors
programme.desc: It's bear season in Alaska, and Mike has been waiting four years to get this permit. He's got an itch to take down a big bear, and the savage is sighted in.

programme.title: Backwoods Life
programme.desc: Michael Lee and Brantley Gilbert head to one of their favorite bowhunting places in the Midwest. It's a honey hole for great deer...if they don't mess it up.

programme.title: RNT-V
programme.desc: The Goose Krewe breaks out the all new LH Winsheseter SX4, testing it out on prairie waterfowl.

programme.title: Ducks Unlimited TV
programme.desc: Our 25th anniversary season kicks off in Nebraska with co-host Fred Zink joining DU staff members and DU University chapter leaders for early-season teal.

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: Mike heads to northeast Oklahoma, then on to Kansas, hoping for a big buck double.

programme.title: Small Town Hunting
programme.desc: As a whitetail bowhunter, there are few things as exciting as having a big buck in 'top pin range. There's not a better place to do that than in Mexico. Big freerange bucks and good buddies make for one of the funnest camps there is. Part 1.

programme.title: Guns & Ammo TV
programme.sub-title: Pass/Fail - NRA Basic Pistol Distinguished Expert Qualification
programme.desc: Our editors review the latest products, get you caught up on the latest techniques, explore historic firearms and demonstrate various pistol qualifications.

programme.title: Guns & Gear TV
programme.desc: Looking back over the last fourteen years of Guns & Gear--bloopers, filming fun, and idiosyncrasies with the Guns & Gear cast, crew, and friends.

programme.title: Hardcore Pursuit
programme.desc: Follow Mike Pelletier to Colorado as he chases muleys in the cornfield flats of the eastern side of the state with his bow.

programme.title: Agents of Change
programme.desc: Tom pushes the limits on the LyteHorse electric ATV: no gas, no exhaust fumes and no engine noise! Then he explores the shift to self-healing, ricochet-free targets with Throom, and why steel targets are a thing of the past.

programme.title: Trijicon's World of Sports Afield
programme.desc: Darren Rhodes joins DSC members Larry Weishuhn and Russell Stacy on the legendary Mescalero Apache Reservation in New Mexico in search of big bull elk.

programme.title: Hardcore Pursuit
programme.desc: Mike and Jordan head to out chase Muleys with Double D Outfitters in Terry, Mont. Looking for the big boy that got away last year.

programme.title: Big Deer TV
programme.desc: In Kansas, Mike has one of his best days deer hunting in a decade.

programme.title: North American Whitetail
programme.desc: Dr. James Kroll debunks myths about the dreaded October Lull. Haynes Shelton profiles Del Austin's Nebraska non-typical, famously nicknamed Mossy Horns.

programme.title: Beyond the Bar With Josh and Shasta
programme.desc: It's the kids' spring break, and the Mullins clan is headed to the target rich environment of Texas.

programme.title: Target rich environment
programme.desc: Two of the larget outfitters in Texas have joined forces as the largest hog hunting operation in the world. Heli-Hunter and Three Curl.

programme.title: The Wild Outdoors
programme.desc: On The Wild Outdoors, Jay Gregory bowhunts everything with his Martin bow - and he loves it! Focusing his hunting efforts in the Midwest, he loves to chase whitetail bucks but also does some remote western hunts.

programme.title: Bill Dance Saltwater
programme.sub-title: The Fun Is in the Fight Part 1
programme.desc: There's more to fishin' than just catchin'. As Bill's old friend Smokin' Joe Frazier once told him, ``The fun is in the fight both in the ring and in fishin'.``.

programme.title: Saltwater Experience
programme.sub-title: Offshore Amberjack, Mutton and Kingfish with Captain Brandon
programme.desc: Captains Tom Rowland and Rich Tudor are joined by Florida Keys guide Brandon Vargas, as they continue from an earlier flurry of offshore permit catches to a variety of fun offshore targets.

programme.title: Last of A Breed
programme.desc: One of Laramy's favorites hunts is spring spot and stalk Black bears. This year is special as he reconnects with the country he loves.

programme.title: The Maverick
programme.desc: Tennessee Turkey Time! Just when you think you've seen it all, Freddy and friends take the hunt to the next level.

programme.title: Steve's Outdoor Adventures
programme.desc: Steve West is joined by Bergara Rifles brand manager Dakota Russell in Argentina for an exciting part two, as Dakota hunts for a massive free range red stag in Argentina.

programme.title: Beyond Rubicon
programme.desc: Brian's mom said it best, Those mule deer have been hard on you! So, Brian sets out to the Arizona desert to try his luck on a velvet buck with his bow.

programme.title: Overland chronicles, the
programme.desc: Scott and Cheyenne don't know it all, but these guys do! From military Special Forces, to the common weekend warrior, this crew trains you to be prepared for any situation, anywhere in the world.

programme.sub-title: Gun Room - Teutonic Pistols: Mauser HSc vs. Walther PP
programme.desc: Our editors review the latest products, get you caught up on the latest techniques, explore historic firearms and demonstrate various pistol qualifications.

programme.title: Heartland Waterfowl
programme.desc: Late August in North Dakota brings an opportunity at chasing early season Canada Geese. It's tradition to unite with Cody, Ty and Big Mike to kickoff another season in NoDak.
